products.name: Pure Tea Tree Oil
products.description: 100% pure Australian tea tree oil, steam-distilled for maximum potency. Known for its powerful antibacterial and antifungal properties.
products.shortDescription: 100% pure Australian tea tree essential oil

products.name: Eucalyptus Blend
products.description: A refreshing blend of eucalyptus and tea tree oils, perfect for respiratory support and air purification.

products.name: Blemish Control Serum
